short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Download videos, images and gif from twitter with only one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
One-click download of videos and images from X (formerly Twitter), true direct download with no redirection, solving your problem of downloading Twitter videos.

This is a free tool that helps users download audio/videos from X.com (Twitter) to their computers. We recommend that users do not download copyrighted content without permission.
ğŸ’¥ X.com (Twitter) Video Downloader Features
â˜‘ï¸ Download Video from X(Twitter)
â˜‘ï¸ Download Image and Carousel from X(Twitter)
â˜‘ï¸ Download Gif from X(Twitter)
â˜‘ï¸ Hide AD post
â˜‘ï¸ Hide "What's Happening" and "Who to follow" 
â˜‘ï¸ Supports seven languages: English, Chinese, German, Spanish, French, Japanese, Portuguese
â˜‘ï¸ No registration or login required
â˜‘ï¸ Easy to use
â˜‘ï¸ 24/7 developer support

Follow these simple steps to easily download any video/image/GIF from Twitter:

Install the extension.
Open the Twitter website (https://x.com).
After installing the extension, a download button will appear below posts containing videos/images/GIFs. Click it to download. If it doesn't appear, refresh the page and try again.
ğŸ•¨ Disclaimer
This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by the official Twitter app/website.
